snippet: Wider contraceptive use is a factor, as 1.1 million abortions were reported in 2011, the Guttmacher Institute said, compared with 1.21 million reported in a similar study in 2008.
abstract: Report released by the Guttmacher Institute finds that the abortion rate among American women declined to its lowest levels in more than three decades in 2011.
lead_paragraph: Wider contraceptive use is a factor, as 1.1 million abortions were reported in 2011, the Guttmacher Institute said, compared with 1.21 million reported in a similar study in 2008.

headline.main: Abortions Declining in U.S., Study Finds
headline.print_headline: Abortions Declining in U.S., Study Finds
